short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate this extension to restore right-click, copy, paste, cut and text selection on restricted websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frustrated by websites that disable right-click, text selection, or copy-paste functionality? With the Allow Right Click Chrome extension, you can effortlessly bypass these restrictions. This user-friendly add-on enables you to restore right-click, cut, copy, paste, and text selection on any website, ensuring you have complete browsing freedom without limitations.

Take back control and easily perform actions like copying text, inspecting elements, or pasting content, even on sites with restrictive settings. Allow Right Click empowers users to enjoy a seamless, unrestricted browsing experience.


Key Features:

Restore Right-Click Functionality: Effortlessly enable right-click on websites that have disabled it.

Enable Copy-Paste: Quickly copy and paste content from web pages where these functions are blocked.

Text Selection Freedom: Select and highlight text on any website, even if text selection is restricted.

Smooth Browsing Experience: Operates unobtrusively in the background, allowing you to browse without interruption.


How to Use the Extension:

1. Install the Extension

Download Allow Right Click from the Chrome Web Store and add it to your browser.
2. Activate It

Click the extension icon in the toolbar to enable its functionality.

3. Visit Any Website

Navigate to a site where right-click, copy-paste, or text selection is disabled.

4. Enjoy Full Access

Use right-click, copy, select, and paste functions freely without restrictions.


Who Can Benefit from This Extension?

Allow Right Click is perfect for:

Researchers needing to gather information from various sources.
Content Creators and Developers who need to copy code snippets or inspect page elements.
Students gathering information for assignments or projects.
Everyday Users wanting a seamless browsing experience without limitations.


Why Choose Allow Right Click?

This extension is invaluable for anyone encountering sites with restricted right-click and copy-paste capabilities. It helps you:

Save time by eliminating browsing restrictions.
Enhance productivity with easy access to copy, paste, and text selection.
Improve user experience by enabling full access to site functionality.


Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs):

Will this extension work on all websites?

Allow Right Click works on most sites. However, some websites may have advanced protections that limit its effectiveness.

Does this extension slow down browsing?

No, it is lightweight and runs smoothly in the background without affecting your browsing speed.

Is it safe to use?

Yes, Allow Right Click is privacy-focused and does not track or store any user data.
